titles: A plea for limited monarchy, as it was established in this nation, before the late war in an humble addresse to His Excellency, General Monck / by a zealot for the good old laws of his country, before any faction or caprice, with additions.
author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.
publisher: Printed by T. Mabb for William Shears ...,
notes: Attributed to Sir Roger L'Estrange. cf. NUC pre-1956.
Copy at reel 944:24 has variant imprint.
Reproductions of original in Huntington Library (reel 944:24) and Corpus Christi College (University of Oxford). Library (reel 2980:32).
